quotes.quote: I built this all by myself using React and TypeScript.
quotes.author: Robin Leber

quotes.quote: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Whether you think you can, or you think you can't - you are right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: The only thing worse than being talked about is not being talked about.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
